segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost amusing how she’s focused on that plate, completely ignoring the overflowing water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing, and I can’t help but wonder what will happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming through the window casts a warm glow on this ordinary scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, it feels like a ticking time bomb with that boy balancing precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching for those cookies like a thief in the night, and it’s almost pitiful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t take my eyes off the girl, waiting eagerly for her turn, her little hand stretching out.
segments.speaker: PAR
